title: Surprise, I'm back!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/qURNu0y.gif/img

After making a very high quality post (rly high quality I swear), and just doing it for the heck of it without knowing what was going on about a certain situation, I got banned for a day :D

... within a minute of posting said high quality post :D ...

#AND I'D DO IT AGAIN!...
######without knowing about what was going on cuz being oblivious is OP, Ik rules mang and is rly gud boi I swear, pls mods be dank to me
